about_the_game:
SPY RUMBLE Private Room Participation Play Commemoration DLC!



To celebrate the SPY RUMBLE Free-to-Play, those who have already purchased the paid version...

We're giving away a shiny, pure gold marshmallow Shining Gold skin!

Shine all over from head to toe and stand out a lot!

　...You may not be suited for undercover missions, but if you can complete your mission in spite of all that, you will be a heroic figure worthy of your glorious appearance.

Shine all over from head to toe and stand out a lot!

　...You may not be suited for undercover missions, but if you can complete your mission in spite of all that, you will be a heroic figure worthy of your glorious appearance.
name: SPY RUMBLE - GOLDEN EDITION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: We're giving away a shiny, pure gold marshmallow Shining Gold skin!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support
